Model Calibration with hdnom

Miaozhu Li <http://miaozhu.li>
Nan Xiao <http://nanx.me>

2017-01-04

Further Reading

To cite our paper (preprint), please use (Xiao, Xu, and Li 2016). For further information about the hdnom project, please visit:

  • hdnom project website: http://hdnom.org
  • hdnom web application: http://hdnom.io
  • hdnom appmaker: http://hdnom.org/appmaker

References

Xiao, Nan, Qing-Song Xu, and Miao-Zhu Li. 2016. “Hdnom: Building Nomograms for Penalized Cox Models with High-Dimensional Survival Data.” BioRxiv. Cold Spring Harbor Labs Journals. doi:10.1101/065524.
